title: The Van Aert Effect: How Racing with the Belgian Superstar Will Help Jorgenson This Spring
content:
Jorgenson bullish on tactics: 'I have a much higher chance of winning on the same team as Wout van Aert than I would racing against him.'

Read the full article at The Van Aert Effect: How Racing with the Belgian Superstar Will Help Jorgenson This Spring on Velo.
author: ahood
